root.name: ellipse()
root.description: Draws an ellipse (oval) to the screen. An ellipse with equal width and height is a circle. By default, the first two parameters set the location, and the third and fourth parameters set the shape's width and height. The origin may be changed with the ellipseMode() function.

parameter.label: c
parameter.description: float: width of the ellipse by default

parameter.label: d
parameter.description: float: height of the ellipse by default
